radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased signal intensity on T2 and fluid-attenuated inversion recovery (FLAIR) sequences in the cerebellar dentate nuclei, periaqueductal region, dorsal midbrain and pons, and inferior olives, symmetrically.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Resolution of previous signal abnormalities noted in June 2003.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal brain MRI with no abnormalities.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Compared to January 2003 MRI findings, showed resolution of previous signal abnormalities.
